name: OB JOBS
description:
Current assignment: "Welcome, decommissioned Zonot! Freshly discharged from your factory job, the world is now your oyster. An oyster full of mainly weeds and trash, but an oyster nonetheless." (Or, find mailboxes and bugs and maybe the meaning of life by exploring a lesbian commune)

Deliver 4 exciting packages! Participate in capitalism (or don't!) to improve your hardware! Discover things you shouldn't!

Game played entirely with WASD/arrow keys.

TIPS for efficient package delivery:
- Explore the environment for clues as to delivery locations
- If package-delivery is not lucrative enough, there are alternative ways of earning credits
- Examine the edges of your periphery for dirt paths to find new locations
- Thorough investigation will be rewarded, especially when interacting with the commune's inhabitants
- Check out obtips.txt for more!
